oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Tyler. Hugh Tyler letter, October 20, 1948. Page 4 of 4.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hugh Tyler
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Hugh Tyler, South Kent, Conn., October 20, 1948. To Helen. Page 4 of 4. Reminisces about living in Knoxville, TN. From the Hugh Tyler Collection
